abstract: Prince Walid bin Talal of Saudi Arabia has taken a big hit on his Citigroup investment. But in an interview with Prestige magazine, he doesn’t sound like he’s giving up on the banking giant.
snippet: Prince Walid bin Talal of Saudi Arabia has taken a big hit on his Citigroup investment. But in an interview with Prestige magazine, he doesn’t sound like he’s giving up on the banking giant.
lead_paragraph: Prince Walid bin Talal of Saudi Arabia has taken a major hit to his personal wealth, and a big reason is his stake in Citigroup. But the prince, a colorful investment magnate, doesn’t sound like he’s giving up on the banking giant.

headline.main: Despite Citi Losses, a Prince Stays Positive
